entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 5.
